title: Episode 20: David Parker Ray AKA “The Toy Box Killer”
description:
Guys. This is one of the worst cases you will ever lend your ears to. Park Ranger and all around rude dude David Parker Ray spent 40 years and over $100,000 dedicating his life to the abduction, torture, rape and murder of countless women. His MO reads like a script for the Saw franchise and that's putting it lightly. Hold onto your butts, because The Toy Box Killer is here.

Sources:

https://allthatsinteresting.com/david-parker-ray-toy-box-killer

https://www.abqjournal.com/70489/victim-tells-of-captivity.html

https://www.fbi.gov/contact-us/field-offices/albuquerque/items-david-parker-ray


Cries in the Desert: The Shocking True Story of a Sadistic Torturer by John Glatt
https://www.therichest.com/shocking/15-disturbing-facts-about-david-ray-parker-the-toy-box-killer/ See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
